first_para: Thomas "Tom" Clarke, CBE, JP (born 10 January 1941) is a British Labour Party politician who has been a Member of Parliament (MP) since 1982 and has represented Coatbridge, Chryston and Bellshill since 2005.

full.extract: Thomas "Tom" Clarke, CBE, JP (born 10 January 1941) is a British Labour Party politician who has been a Member of Parliament (MP) since 1982 and has represented Coatbridge, Chryston and Bellshill since 2005.
full.title: Tom Clarke (politician)
